item.title: NTNU EMI Talent and Leadership Course Presentation
item.description:
2025 年國立臺灣師範大學 EMI 教學資源中心 113-2 學期暑期課程【EMI 人才與領導課程】成果簡報發表

恭喜陳映竹 (Ying-Chu Chen) 在這次發表中展現了卓越的英語教學技巧與領導能力，透過精心準備的簡報贏得了評審們的肯定👏。
他的努力與專業不僅為自己帶來了榮譽，也為 EMI 教學資源中心增添了光彩✨。
讓我們一起祝賀陳映竹，並期待他在未來的 EMI 課程中繼續發揮所長，為學生帶來更多的啟發與成長📚💡。

NTNU EMI Talent and Leadership Course Summer Program Presentation

🎉🎊 Congratulations to Ying-Chu Chen for his outstanding performance in the 2025 NTNU EMI Teaching Resource Center 113-2 Summer Program [EMI Talent and Leadership Course]! 🥳🌟

Ying-Chu showcased excellent English presentation skills and strong leadership abilities, earning high praise from the judges with his well-prepared presentation👏.
His dedication and expertise not only brought him personal honor but also added prestige to the EMI Teaching Resource Center✨.

Join us in celebrating Ying-Chu Chen’s achievement, and look forward to his continued contributions in future EMI courses, bringing more inspiration and growth to his students📚💡.
